desc: 광산에 나타나 은을 소재로 집을 짓는 성질을 가진 딱정벌레

dictionary.lore: A bug that makes its nest out of silver found in the mineral mountains. It is very swift and resembles a shooting star flying in the dark forests, hence its name. It’s said that its body is made of magic, which reduces to dust when it dies. It is tricky to preserve and is rarely captured in a perfect state.

name: 은혜갑충
